translations.7697709344350439561: Please enter a valid Currency value e.g. 123.15
translations.8109121977437961600: Quickly calculate an optimal euro denomination breakdown for any amount and see the difference to an existing breakdown.
translations.5778653233393489696: Compute the minimal number of notes and coins (in euros) needed to represent an amount.
translations.8486206174544110124: Show the difference between the previous breakdown and the new breakdown.
translations.5490695508477165984: Provide a simple web UI and an API endpoint for programmatic use.
translations.6160774493598252517: Enter an amount (in euros) in the denomination page.
translations.5826054484595162637: Submit to view the breakdown and the difference to the previous breakdown.
translations.2123033461165586531: The UI is built with Angular. This app supports two calculation modes which can be switched in the UI:
translations.5685577184486058734: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Frontend mode{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} — calculation runs in the browser
translations.6216129826976581240: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Backend mode{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} — calculation is performed by the backend service at {$START_TAG_CODE}/api/public/denomination/v1{$CLOSE_TAG_CODE} (POST).
translations.3996165418379593323: Choose the mode using the frontend/backend toggle in the app. The README contains the API request/response JSON shape for backend mode.
translations.8321825248177897228: See the project README at the repository root for build, run and Docker instructions.
translations.2787379918444737545: Select a theme for the app
translations.2285537773737675252: Select a language for the app
